item.title: Build An OTA
item.description: Online Travel Agency written in Angular For this quickstart tutorial, we have prepared a repository that contains the full Angular code for the OTA clone. All you need to do is to get TravelgateX credentials and connect it with the Angular application. Let’s get started! OTA Angular
